New Records: Shaheen Shah Afridi took 3 wickets in the first over for the first time in his T20I career
Key Match Events: Gareth Delany and Mark Adair's 44-run partnership off 30 balls
Curtis Campher and Barry McCarthy took four wickets for 10 runs
Abbas Afridi's 17 runs brought the target down to 12
Shaheen Shah Afridi's two heaved sixes sealed a win for Pakistan
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam expressed relief after Pakistan's nervy win
Shaheen Shah Afridi was praised for his phenomenal display of left-arm swing bowling
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan's World Cup campaign ended with a nervy three-wicket win
Imad Wasim took 3 for 8 in four overs, likely his last game for Pakistan
Josh Little's cameo of 22 runs took Ireland to 106
Shaheen Shah Afridi ended an eight-match dry spell without a first-over wicket
Others: Pakistan's collapse in the middle overs left Babar Azam alone with a relatively long tail
Ireland's recovery was led by Gareth Delany and Mark Adair's attacking play
Pakistan's jitters were evident as they lost wickets in a frenetic phase
